pages.text:
Bryson’s Irish Pub – About Us
Welcome to Bryson’s Irish Pub, where tradition meets hospitality in the heart of Virginia Gardens. As a family-owned and operated establishment, we take pride in offering an unforgettable experience for our guests. Nestled at 3790 Curtiss Parkway, our pub has become a beloved gathering spot in the community, known for its warm atmosphere and exceptional service.
At Bryson’s, we’re more than just a pub – we’re a destination for those seeking quality libations and delectable cuisine. Our extensive selection boasts well-known brands of beer, bourbon, whiskey, scotch, rum, vodka, and tequila, ensuring there’s something to satisfy every palate. From creamy liqueurs to fine wines from around the globe, our carefully curated offerings cater to discerning tastes.
But it’s not just about the drinks – our menu is a celebration of flavors, featuring freshly prepared dishes that appeal to the whole family. With daily specials and outdoor dining options, every visit to Bryson’s is an opportunity to indulge in culinary delights. Join us every Saturday for our renowned “Hurricane Steak Dinner,” a signature dish that’s sure to tantalize your taste buds.
Bryson’s is your home away from home conveniently located near Miami international airport!

Contact Us
Looking to get in touch with us? We’re conveniently located in the picturesque Virginia Gardens, just a stone’s throw away from Miami International Airport. Whether you have questions about our menu, want to inquire about hosting an event, or simply want to say hello, we’re here to assist you. Feel free to reach out to us via phone or visit us in person. You can also connect with us online by sending us an email! We look forward to hearing from you and welcoming you to Bryson’s Irish Pub!
(305) 871-9534
brysonsirishpub@gmail.com
3790 Curtiss Pkwy, Virginia Gardens, FL
